channel.title: Distinctcraft - A truely Distinct Minecraft Server!
channel.description:
[center][b]-[About Distinctcraft]-[/b]
We are a Minecraft server just starting up. We strive to be a different type of Factions PVP server. We have the following features on our server:
- In-Depth Magic Wands and spells plugin. - (Makes raiding very interesting!) - Factions / PVP - - Ranking system - - McMMO - - Boss Mobs - - Emerald Armor (Coming soon) - - Adding certain items to armor gives the armor special effects like: Speed, higher jumping etc. - (Coming soon) - And more! We are constantly adding and updating the server. -
Also, be sure to visit our website at http://www.distinctcraft.com
We've just started up 2 weeks ago, I think the server is very fun to play on, it just needs some recognition. Please give the server a legitimate chance, thanks. [/center]
[center][b]IP: play.distinctcraft.com[/b][/center]
